overview: After two years (1987-1988) as an auditor at Mazars, Philippe Queveau became a partner at GCI, a company operating in the media sector. In 1990, he joined the Henri Heuliez group, as deputy Managing Director, then Managing Director of the SociÃ©tÃ© FinanciÃ¨re Heuliez and CEO of the SA Henri Heuliez. He joined CITA in 1994, and became deputy Managing Director in 1996. Philippe Queveau graduated from the Ecole Polytechnique.
